entities.name: prophet
entities.description: The Prophet is mentioned as a source of information that the characters doubt. The text does not provide further details about who or what the Prophet is.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who have broken out of Azkaban fortress. They are mentioned as being responsible for the escape.

entities.name: azkaban fortress
entities.description: Azkaban fortress is a location where Death Eaters were imprisoned. It has been breached and the prisoners have escaped.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is mentioned as having a conversation with him and Ron in the corridors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as being part of a group that has been discussing the escape of Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is mentioned as having a conversation with Hermione and Harry in the corridors.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being part of a group that is discussing something in hushed tones.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being part of a group that is discussing something in hushed tones.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being part of a group that is discussing something in hushed tones.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being the reason why teachers are not able to discuss things freely in the staffroom.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters have escaped from Azkaban fortress, as mentioned in the text: 'It was not only the students’ mood that had changed. It was now quite common to come across two or three teachers conversing in low, urgent whispers in the corridors...'
Hermione is friends with Harry, as mentioned in the text: '...as she, Harry, and Ron passed Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Hermione is friends with Ron, as mentioned in the text: '...as she, Harry, and Ron passed Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Harry is friends with Ron, as mentioned in the text: '...as she, Harry, and Ron passed Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Professor McGonagall is a colleague of Professor Flitwick, as mentioned in the text: '...Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Professor McGonagall is a colleague of Professor Sprout, as mentioned in the text: '...Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Professor Flitwick is a colleague of Professor Sprout, as mentioned in the text: '...Professors McGonagall, Flitwick, and Sprout huddled together outside the Charms classroom one day.'
Professor Umbridge is a supervisor of Professor McGonagall, as mentioned in the text: '...“N ot with Umbridge there.”'
Professor Umbridge is a supervisor of Professor Flitwick, as mentioned in the text: '...“N ot with Umbridge there.”'
Professor Umbridge is a supervisor of Professor Sprout, as mentioned in the text: '...“N ot with Umbridge there.”'}
